Detailed Description

Processes the requestpackets that are send to the EmailModule.

EmailSender *  emailSender
) 
 

Creates a new EmailProcessor that uses the loadedMaps to communicate with the reader.

Parameters:
loadedMaps Vector used to tell the Reader about the currently loaded maps. { { NB!} Since this module does not have any maps, this is not used!}
emailSender The object with which emails are sent, the EmailProcessor takes ownership of the EmailSender and deletes it.
